structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
C RESTRUCTURE OF LOCAL GOVERNMENT IN COUNTY CONTAINING CITY OF FIRST CLASS

law.catch_line: State Auditor to annually conduct audit of consolidated local government's funds.
law.text: The Auditor of Public Accounts, in order to insure the authorized, legal, regular, and safe handling, administration, or expenditure of public funds, shall annually audit the funds budgeted by any consolidated local government in a county containing a city of the first class. Actions taken by the Auditor and the local government for compliance with this section shall be the same as those required by KRS Chapters 43 and 424 and by KRS 43.070, 64.810, 64.820, 64.830, 64.840, and 64.850 relating to financial administration and the responsibilities of the handling of public funds.
law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 189, sec. 17, effective July 14, 2000.
